title: Top PH Lifestyle and Travel blogger Kryz Uy launches Behind The Blog book - InqPOP!

organizations.name: books brand statements top ph lifestyle and travel

text: You are at: InqPOP! Books Brand Statements Top PH Lifestyle and Travel blogger Kryz Uy launches Behind The Blog book Top PH Lifestyle and Travel blogger Kryz Uy launches Behind The Blog book InqPOP! | January 11th, 2017 MANILA, Philippines – After 2 very successful book signing events in Metro Manila, and Cebu, Kryz Uy officially launched her book with a private screening of Rogue One: Star Wars in the VIP Cinema of Robinsons Movieworld, Cebu. “I chose Cebu and a movie screening as a launch because it’s my way of saying thank you to friends and family who have supported me through this whole journey. I handpicked the whole team that helped me with my book, and they are all from Cebu. I wanted to show the world that there is so much untapped potential in my hometown,” Kryz said. It was such a giddy afternoon for those who attended the book launching of Behind the Blog as Kryz gamely took selfies and signed autographs for the fans. Going from virtual posts to tangible paperback, Kryz Uy wrote this casual guide to her seemingly glamorous trade. Get to know more about the world of blogging as one of the Philippines’ top bloggers recalls her more memorable misadventures. Unplugged and uncensored, get to know a side of Kryz you’d never see online. “This isn’t a clip show of material I’ve published online. It’s a collection of thoughts, fears, hopes and dreams throughout the years that I’d probably never tweet out. It’s stress-eating and heartbreak, inner battles, and triumphs that I’m sure every modern girl with a goal has had,” Kryz stated. Kryz Uy joins an elite roster of API authors which include Senator Miriam Defensor Santiago, Alex Gonzaga, Georgina Wilson, Solenn Heussaff, and Ramon Bautista. Priced at 245 pesos, Behind the Blog is available in bookstores nationwide and will soon be digitally published in ABS-CBN Publishing Inc’a reading app, NoInk. Available for free in the App store and Google Play. ADVT
